::Hot Rod::

It dawned on him what happaned. He wrote a letter.

Dear Feline,

I see that the Alliance has reprogramed you to your former self, and
erased your memories of me. Considering this there is nothing to make me
stay here. I'm going back to the Maximals. But I promis you I will be
back for you. I'm not going to give up on you.
I am leaving you one of my medals. Something for you to remember, or
help to remember me by. I'll be back. I love you.

                                Omae Wa Korosu- I love you
                                           -Hot Rod

He took the letter to her room. He pulled out what looked like 'wings'
medals that Navy pilots get. In the center was the Autobot symbol, with
the wings going to either side. He wrapped it in the letter, and sliped
it under her door.

He quickly made his way out of the base, transformed, and headed towards
the CF.
